Open Maps app for getting directions to %1$s? Your current location is required for finding places near you. Please try again in a moment //-------------------------------------------- MESSAGES -------------------------------------------/
//---------------------------------------- FILTER STRINGS -----------------------------------------/ in %1$s, %2$s places
KEYWORD type a keyword
PLACE FILTERS Open now Popular places
SHOW BEST %1$s PLACES
DISTANCE UNIT Kilometer/Meter Miles/Yards
SORT BY Sort by distance Sort by rating Sort by likes
DISTANCE LIKES RATING //---------------------------------------- FILTER STRINGS -----------------------------------------/
//-------------------------------------- ADD PLACE STRINGS ----------------------------------------/ Add Place
PLACE NAME Type place name
CATEGORY
LOCATION Select location Location Selection Touch to map to choose location
ADDRESS ADDRESS Type place address
DESCRIPTION Type place description
WEB PAGE Type web page
PHONE NUMBER Type phone number
TWITTER Type twitter user name
FACEBOOK Type facebook user name
PHOTO Choose Photo
Please fill in all fields! Pleaase fill in all fields Thank you! Your place has been added. We are unable to add your place at this time. Please try again in a moment! //-------------------------------------- ADD PLACE STRINGS ----------------------------------------/
//------------------------------------- PLACE DETAIL STRINGS --------------------------------------/ OPEN CLOSED
REVIEWS PHOTOS DEALS
Like this place Add to Favorites Remove from Favorites Write a Review Upload Photo
away from you
Uploading... Upload failed! Uploaded
Rating: //------------------------------------- PLACE DETAIL STRINGS --------------------------------------/
//------------------------------------- WRITE REVIEW STRINGS --------------------------------------/ RATING
FULL NAME Type your full name
EMAIL ADDRESS Type your email address
YOUR REVIEW Type your review
Thank you! Your review has been sent. We are unable to send your review at this time. Please try again in a moment!
